column4: what's the tool that let's you search all text files on your system callewd?
the desktop search index I mean.. how do I turn it on?
Try search apt-cache for desktop search
it is installed by default I think

go to sessions and see whether you can add it to your start up. I wish I were home and run I could tell you exactly where to go but check your top panel and right click and go to add it. After you add it then go to it's preferences or properties to customize
